import React, {FunctionComponent} from "react" import Link from 'next/link' import { Grid, Icon, IconButton, Button } from '@material-ui/core' import PhoneIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Phone' import EmailIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Email' import PlaceIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Place'; import UrlProcess from "../../modules/urlProcess" interface ContactProp { image: string name: string address: string mobile: string phone: string, email: string } interface InvestorProp { id: string name: string description: string slug: string email: string website: string image: string address: { ward: string, district: string, city: string } phone: string mobile: string } interface ProjectDetailsProp { contact: ContactProp investor: InvestorProp } const starIconEnable = ( ) const starIconDisable = ( ) const ContactArea: FunctionComponent = (props: ProjectDetailsProp) => { let brokerAvatar = UrlProcess.processImageUrl(props.contact.image, 'broker') let statusUserDescription = false let description = props.investor.description // description, name, cover, address, phone, email, mobile, website, image, // address { ward, district, city }, phone, mobile let _address = props.investor.address.ward + ", " + props.investor.address.district + ", " + props.investor.address.city return (
